com.aliyun.oss.common.comm

类 ServiceClient.Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aliyun.oss.common.comm.HttpMesssage
      • com.aliyun.oss.common.comm.ServiceClient.Request
  • 封闭类:
    ServiceClient

    public static class ServiceClient.Request
extends HttpMesssage
    Wrapper class based on HttpMessage that represents HTTP request message to OSS.
